Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 6 Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga » 6.2 Abhidhammabhājanīya » 6.2.12 Avijjāmūlakakusalaniddesa
6.2.12.2 Rūpāvacarakusalacitta
Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga
Abhidhammabhājanīya
Avijjāmūlakakusalaniddesa
Rūpāvacarakusalacitta
340.
1303Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi…pe…  paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā pasādo, pasādapaccayā adhimokkho, adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. ( )
<< 6.2.12.1.2 Mahākusalacittaup6.2.12.3 Arūpāvacarakusalacitta >>
